description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. MusicNow! is a music jukebox and the fastest way to access your music library on your XBOX.  Utilizing the new SEMpick UI you can find a specific Artist, Ablum, or Song with fewer keystrokes than any other product available.
description.short: MusicNow! is a music jukebox and the fastest way to access your music library on your XBOX.  Utilizing the new SEMpick UI you can find a specific Artist, Ablum, or Song with fewer keystrokes than any other product available.
